identity.name: Arunoday Vidyalay
identity.vibe: Sunny Future - A blend of playful energy and academic trust

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and card headers. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, inputs, and data tables.

usage_rules.gradients: NO linear gradients for backgrounds. Use solid blocks of color or subtle noise textures.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Always use #023047 (Deep Navy) for text on light backgrounds. Never use pure black.
usage_rules.admin_dashboard: Use White (#FFFFFF) background with Deep Navy (#023047) sidebar for professional contrast.
usage_rules.student_dashboard: Use Warm Off-White (#FEFAE0) background with colorful card accents.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to remove digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Use floating 3D shapes (books, pencils, globes) or abstract geometric blobs in primary colors for hero sections.

public_pages.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A). Use asymmetrical spans. Never equal columns.
public_pages.spacing: Generous. Use p-12 to p-24 for section padding.
public_pages.hero: Split layout. Text on left (large, Fredoka), Image on right (cutout or framed in blob shape).

dashboards.sidebar: Fixed width (250px), Deep Navy background, White text.
dashboards.cards: Clean white cards with colored top borders (border-t-4) to distinguish categories (e.g., Yellow for Fees, Blue for Grades).

instructions_to_main_agent.2: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and fonts defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Public vs Dashboard structure.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: For the 'Home' page, use the 'hero_building' image with a heavy overlay or cutout effect.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: Ensure the 'Admin Dashboard' feels distinct (more rigid/data-heavy) from the 'Student Dashboard' (more colorful/gamified).
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Use the 'buttons.primary' style for all main CTAs (Login, Pay Fees).
instructions_to_main_agent.7: Mock the 'Bank of Baroda' payment flow with a simple modal that simulates success after 2 seconds.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
